song.title: Arabian Feelings
song.info:
Not a game music or film soundtrack this time, but a music I started to compose myself as soon as I heard a little piece of oriental music while walking on a street.
Some new and fresh ideas in this song, mainly inspired from the oriental and "space-sounding" instruments I've used in it.
As a result, "Arabian Feelings" can be considered considered as a combination of oriental and space-sounding melodies, some parts of them having also been inspired from an excellent music track by Karsten Koch, named "Jupiter's Orbit".
